001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.annotations;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007
008/**
009 * Defines an implementation type for UI components.
010 *
011 * <p>This annotation is used to associate a specific implementation class
012 * with a predefined UI component type. It allows the framework to
013 * dynamically instantiate the correct component implementation based
014 * on its type definition.
015 *
016 * <p>Commonly used in UI component implementations such as alerts, checkboxes,
017 * dropdowns, and other interactive elements.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
022@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
023public @interface ImplementationOfType {
024
025   /**
026    * Specifies the component type this implementation corresponds to.
027    *
028    * @return The type identifier for the UI component.
029    */
030   String value();
031}
